text: Now we've completed talking about the control variables, let's look at three very distinct profiling patterns you can expect to see when looking at the volume profiles. The first would be trending, the second would be short covering and the third long liquidation. We're now going to go through each one of these individually, look at the characteristics and then turn to the chalkboard so I can show you how to develop your strategies
